name: Relax Walk VR
description: Visit 6 Beautiful Places in VR and Relax.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 3570 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 or better Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 7700K Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 Ti Storage: 1500 MB available space
